post.body: G'night! :D
Hehe. Soon as I get back from the US, I'm cropping it short. (My mother and I often argue about this... silly parental units)
You have NO idea. >:D ;-)
Hey, that's so right. Except it'd probably try to make money off -me-, and I don't have that self control. XD
Awesome!
I could swear you were the good guys or something. I need to read up.
Is this on a fanfic.net account? Link me!
Congrats! :D
He finds your lack of faith disturbing.
Epic truth.
Agreed about the bitching atheists.
Agreed. They had the waterfall again in Sydney! :D
HURRY UP AND READ.
Much appreciated :D
*Huggles*
Reading that made my neck sore. D:
I love and am addicted to Twitter.
Hooray! @cybersanta is giving me a pet Vulcan! :D
http://tinyurl.com/5z9g3s - Beyond stupid.
Oh, get this latest one: "If you cut your hair you'll look like a lesbian."
The ferrets are all getting along! :D Kaz is starting to pounce Lu whenever she scruffs him. He's gonna end up top ferret when he's bigger.
Clouds are gone! Shooting stars tonight! :D
Good news, though: I have a plan! If I slowly change my surroundings, my mind will change to adapt. Now to start those changes...
Feeling better. I'd have a break from the internet if there was anything else to do... maybe catch up on my reading.
"If it offends you, it's because it rings true" has never been so true before.
Ugh, the angst. Make it go away. (What's wrong with me? I complain no one accepts me for who I am, but I won't accept myself.)
THE CLOUDS ARE BACK. NOOOOO. Shooting stars!!!!
Deschooling's coming along nicely already!
PET VULCAN. I wants one.
I dreamed I hugged a Vulcan once. I want a pet Vulcan. :( That'd be epic.
Should cut down on sugar... hang it, I'm on a holiday.
Hooray for all-nighters! Probably helps I got up at 5PM yesterday. I get new glasses today! And I can't wait to start planning that fanfic.
Suggestive Tarzan toy - http://tinyurl.com/49e2q8
Yay, general anxiety! KILL IT.
Going to start educating myself properly about blogging when I work on traffic. I'm optimistic. :)
Yay, novel anxiety.
Feels good to be up at 5AM again. Even if it's because I stayed up all night. <_<
Tuesday, I saw a picture of a skydiving ferret. No joke.
Going to work on traffic once I've got a decent amount of articles up.
Just went "WTF?" at MR's stats. 20 in one day? That's a lot for me, especially as I rarely do anything to boost traffic.
Researching for fanfic. Hooray.
Arghles.
I never, ever thought I'd write a serious Twilight fanfic, but I'm about to. Now, if only my ego'd stop sniping about it.
Kaz the ferret peed and pooped on the operating table today. Vet seemed very amused.
How come it's always time to sleep when I feel motivated?
Help! I'm turning into a fangirl!
Slept all today, then remembered I need to be up all tomorrow. Gah.
The forms asked me if I was a terrorist or a Nazi. No joke.
Filling in border protection forms makes me scared of the US.
Printed out photos, avoiding cousins! Life is good.
Speaking of ferrets, the four are finally cuddling up to sleep together! :D
... Why are people I don't know following me? O_o
*Ducks flames*
Going on a trip on Monday! HELLO AMERICA! (I hear that pisses the natives off. <.<)
Hmm, do I tell this story from T or R's POV? Both are just as interesting.
New icon! Isn't it adorable?
Why is Hitler showing up everywhere again? First my Dad gets WWII documentries for Christmas, then a webcomic takes on that theme. WTF?
Already defying new year's resolution, and we're only fifteen and a half hours into the new year.
Happy New Year! ZOMGSLEEP.
My copy of Inkdeath is missing pages 491-522. :(
